Name: Arduino
Author: Wotever
Description: Arduino support for RGB leds, I2C LCD, TM1638, motor/fans boards and many more.

Name: Audio Control
Author: Wotever
Description: Gives access to various audio data such as FFT for bargraphs and the ability to play MP3

Name: BA63 USB Display plugin
Author: Wotever
Description: Connect a Diebold Nixdorf BA63 Display

Name: Belt tensionner
Author: Wotever
Description: Provide support for belt tensionner

Name: Controllers input
Author: Wotever
Description: Allows to read game controllers (wheel, gamepad, button box) data

Name: Custom serial devices
Author: Wotever
Description: Provide support for custom serial devices

Name: Dash Studio
Author: Wotever
Description: Allows to build and run dash/overlays on monitors, phones, tablets or USBD480

Name: Gmail
Author: Wotever
Description: Connect to your gmail account and get access to your last mails

Name: Headset Info
Author: Wotever
Description: Provide G533 battery level info (experimental)

Name: Keyboard Emulator
Author: Wotever
Description: Allow you to emulate key presses from any SimHub input

Name: Keyboard Input
Author: Wotever
Description: Allows to read keyboard inputs (use with caution)

Name: Midi Controllers Input
Author: Wotever
Description: Use midi controllers as input.

Name: Nextion display
Author: Wotever
Description: Provide support for Nextion screens

Name: Serial port notifier
Author: Wotever
Description: Shows a notification when a serial port is added or removed, allowing you to easily keep track of whatâ€™s been plugged in and out.

Name: ShakeIt Bass Shakers
Author: Wotever
Description: Provide ShakeIt (tactile feedback) features for bass shakers

Name: ShakeIt Motors
Author: Wotever
Description: Provide ShakeIt (tactile feedback) features for motors and fans

Name: ShakeIt Wind
Author: Wotever
Description: Provide ShakeIt simplified features for fans

Name: Statistics
Author: Wotever
Description: Shows lap history and statistics.

Name: Thrustmasters FFB control
Author: Wotever
Description: Allow you to control your thrustmaster FFB ingame

Name: UDP Relay
Author: Wotever
Description: The UDP Relay plugin allows to receive UDP data from a game (like codemaster) and send it to multiple targets.
